translations: n.头巾；大手帕（bandana 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 头巾, 丝制手帕, 三角巾

sentences.sentence: Here, I'll even give you one of our red bandanas.
sentences.translation: 来，我要给你代表我们帮派的红头巾。

sentences.sentence: Obivously the bright orange bandana can be used to signal but bandanas also have many other USES.
sentences.translation: 明亮的橘红色手帕可以用来施放信号，但它的功用不仅仅只是这些。

sentences.sentence: According to Hon Hai, on the morning of February 19 in juarez, a group of about 30 workers waiting for a company bus after the night shift "began to cover up their faces with bandanas in unison".
sentences.translation: 鸿海表示，2月19日清早，在juarez，一群正在等候公司班车的夜班工人“开始不约而同地用手帕蒙住脸部”，他们大约有30人左右。
